title: LoL Client/Login Issue (Please Help)
body:
I have been having a lot of trouble playing lol recently, as every time I start up the client and click 'Launch' instead of taking me to what I expect to be the login screen, the client just goes black, only showing me the current patch in the top left corner, and the option to minimise or close the launcher in the top right corner.

I have followed numerous tutorials and guides on the internet that claim to be fix's for the issue but with no luck. I have just recently uninstalled LoL from my computer and reinstalled, to be faced with the exact same issue I had previous to this. 

If anyone can help me, or put me in touch with someone that can it would be greatly appreciated as this is really beginning to annoy me ._.

PLS  people of the community, be my saviour

replies.body: I am having this same issue right now. I managed to get into the client by hovering over the type boxes (username and password things), but the issues persists inside too :(
